name: Scotty
description:
OH HEY, Scotty!

These not-so-normal sized Hair Accessories come in three different sizes, SMALL, REGULAR, XLRG that are in STOCK!

Hand-sewn and designed by Kimmi, each hair-piece is a bit of her Art-Kookiness, Love for her inner kid, and dedication to her cousin Chestine and James Langston...

For custom orders and/or smaller sizes...  hi@sonnyboylanston.com
SMALL - $40.00 10 x 10"
REGULAR - $80.00 16 x 11"
XLRG - $125.00 21 x 16 3/4" of HairBow Awesomeness!

*Please note that same fabric may not be available

name: Poolside
description:

name: Betty
description:
You may proceed...back to the 50s!!

"Dazzlin' Gals! This Fleece RETRO bow will have all the cool cats shakin' in their Creepers!!"
Ok enough of that...

The Betty Bow is a size LARGE, but very cutesy and semi-lightweight.

Hand-sewn and designed by Kimmi, each hair-piece is a bit of her Art-Kookiness, Love for her inner kid, and dedication to her cousin Chestine and James Langston...

*Custom orders and/or smaller sizes... hi@sonnyboylangston.com
SMALL - $40.00 
REGULAR - $80.00
LRG - $120.00

*Please note that same fabric may not be available

name: Blu&JESSIE
description:
Kimmi's favorite prints, she added this custom piece to the collection let out your EXTREME WILD side... meet Jessie

Blu, iridescent taffeta... super lightweight! Changes from maroon to blue (18"w x 14" in house)

Hand-sewn and designed by Kimmi, each hair-piece is a bit of her Art-Kookiness, Love for her inner kid, and dedication to her cousin Chestine and James Langston...

*Custom orders and/or smaller sizes... hi@sonnyboylangston.com
SMALL - $45.00 
REGULAR - $80.00
XLRG - $150.00 


*Please note that same fabric may not be available

name: Blk&White Collection
description:
The Madams of Black&White...

Lady - XLarge Cotton Black on Black Jacquard (24 1/4 x 17 1/2" in house) 

Lacie - XLarge Fleur de Lis Taffeta and Suede (approx. 20"w x 17" in house)

Maddie - XLarge Cotton Paisley (24 1/4 x 17 1/2" in house)

Hand-sewn and designed by Kimmi, each hair-piece is a bit of her Art-Kookiness, Love for her inner kid, and dedication to her cousins James and Chestine Langston...

*Custom orders and/or smaller sizes... hi@sonnyboylangston.com
SMALL - $50
REGULAR - $110
XLARGE - $160

*Please note that same fabric may not be available

*Designer's note: This 'NOT-SO-NORMAL" sized headband is heavier than the normal. So unless you are dedicating a number to the fabulous Tina Turner, it will not be too heavy to wear out and about!
